resources.string:
Version 18.3 (08 January 2018)

\u2022 Fix issue on view where removing items displayed the wrong title

Version 18.2 (07 January 2018)

\u2022 Fix to swrls being duplicated when searching for details

Version 18.1 (07 January 2018)

\u2022 Fix to search filter being hidden when pressing back

Version 18 (01 January 2018)

\u2022 Search filters now available on the lists!

Version 17 (01 January 2018)

\u2022 Swipe right from your list to recommend Swrls

Version 16 (27 December 2017)

\u2022 List remembers last scroll position when pressing back

Version 15 (24 December 2017)

\u2022 Christmas update!
\u2022 Swipe left to dismiss discovered Swrls
\u2022 Re-add Swrls you previously marked as Done

Version 14 (17 December 2017)

\u2022 Register and forgotten password links on the login page

Version 13.1 (11 December 2017)

\u2022 Keep up to date with swrl.co with all your actions!

Version 13 (03 December 2017)

\u2022 Added IMDB URL to details for films

Version 12 (02 December 2017)

\u2022 Syncing all swrls with swrl.co backs up active and done swrls

Version 11.1.1 (29 November 2017)

\u2022 See progress of refresh all details

Version 11 (28 November 2017)

\u2022 Added User Profile image of the author of the Swrl
\u2022 Avoid refreshing the lists all the time with caching improvements

Version 10.3 (20 November 2017)

\u2022 UI improvements and fixes

Version 10.2 (12 November 2017)

\u2022 UI improvements including swipe to refresh, more color and better subtitles!

Version 10.1 (06 November 2017)

\u2022 Can now identify and filter websites and videos

Version 10.0 (06 November 2017)

\u2022 You can now login to Swrl.co and see recommendations from users!
\u2022 When logged in, the discover feed will be weighted to you

Version 9.4 (05 November 2017)

\u2022 Filter discover results if already saved in your list

Version 9.3.1 (29 October 2017)

\u2022 Ui improvements and a link to this dialog from the menu

Version 9.3 (28 October 2017)

\u2022 Added clickable URls to details

Version 9.2 (28 October 2017)

\u2022 Images for albums and websites

Version 9.1.1 (28 October 2017)

\u2022 UI improvements

Version 9.1 (27 October 2017)

\u2022 Bug fix when opening swrl on discover feed

Version 9.0 (25 October 2017)

\u2022 Discover Swrls from swrl.co to add to your list!
\u2022 New Icon!
\u2022 Loads of UI fixes

Version 8.4 (20 September 2017)

\u2022 Bug Fix for Refresh All Details option

Version 8.3 (20 September 2017)

\u2022 Add Refresh All Details option

Version 8.2 (20 September 2017)

\u2022 Highlight selected filter

Version 8.1 (19 September 2017)

\u2022 UI improvements to view screen

Version 8.0 (18 September 2017)

\u2022 Improve view screen details

Version 7.23 (17 September 2017)

\u2022 Fixes to number totals of list filters

Version 7.22 (17 September 2017)

\u2022 Add number totals to filters

Version 7.21 (17 September 2017)

\u2022 Add filters to the Main List View

Version 7.20 (03 September 2017)

\u2022 Bug Fixes

Version 7.19 (02 September 2017)

\u2022 Tweaking the images in the list view to render faster

Version 7.18 (30 August 2017)

\u2022 Various UI improvements

Version 7.17 (28 August 2017)

\u2022 Show searching spinner on view page when open

Version 7.16 (20 August 2017)

\u2022 Various fixes on View screen

Version 7.15 (19 August 2017)

\u2022 Remove Done button from View Screen \u2022 Bug Fixes

Version 7.14 (19 August 2017)

\u2022 Swipe to mark Swrls as Done

Version 7.13 (30 July 2017)

\u2022 Visual updates

Version 7.12 (29 May 2017)

\u2022 Improved View Screen for details

Version 7.11 (29 May 2017)

\u2022 Get full details of the Swrls

Version 7.10 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 Cosmetic changes

Version 7.9 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 View screen shows search results if your Swrl has no details

Version 7.8 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 Can click on a search result to see more details before adding it.

Version 7.7 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 First attempt at the View Screen. Click on a Row to see it.

Version 7.6 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Fix for image resizing

Version 7.5 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Images are cached for faster processing

Version 7.4 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Can now search for board games

Version 7.3 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Added ellipses on title and added missing icons

Version 7.2 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Cleaned up the images on the rows

Version 7.1 (13 May 2017)

\u2022 Search works and now it has images!

Version 7.0 (12 May 2017)

\u2022 Changed the way you add Swrls to a new screen

Version 6.3 (19 February 2017)

\u2022 Can choose a type when pressing enter

Version 6.2 (31 December 2016)

\u2022 Fix Bug when undoing Swrls marked as Done

Version 6.1 (29 December 2016)

\u2022 Swrls can now be added as a Type
\u2022 Can undo marking swrls as done

Version 6 (27 December 2016)

\u2022 First iteration of the Full Screen view of a Swrl listing
